metadata.title: Terms of Service - SoloBoard
metadata.description: Read SoloBoard's Terms of Service covering account security, API usage, subscriptions, and service scope.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing SoloBoard Command Center, you agree to these Terms. SoloBoard is a product of SoloBoard ("we," "us," or "our").

sections.title: Service Scope
sections.content: SoloBoard provides a visualization tool. We do not own your data; we simply provide the interface to monitor your metrics from third-party providers (Stripe, GitHub, etc.).

items.subtitle: API Keys
items.content: You are responsible for the security of your API keys.

items.subtitle: Read-Only Access
items.content: We strongly recommend providing Read-Only permissions for all third-party integrations to minimize risk.

items.subtitle: Encryption
items.content: We secure your data using industry-standard AES-256 encryption.

items.subtitle: Billing
items.content: Subscriptions are billed in advance according to your selected plan (Starter, Base, or Pro).

items.subtitle: Cancellations
items.content: You may cancel at any time. Your access will remain active until the end of the current billing cycle.

items.subtitle: Refunds
items.content: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis within 14 days of purchase.

sections.title: Prohibited Use
sections.content: You agree not to use SoloBoard for any illegal activities or to attempt to breach our security infrastructure.

transparency_note.content: Have questions about our legal terms? We believe in transparency. Send a DM to our founder on X
